title: Bill Gates To Skip AI Impact Summit Keynote; Ankur Vora To Represent Foundation
description: The announcement comes amid the ongoing summit in New Delhi, which features prominent global figures in technology and AI and aims to highlight India's leadership in responsible and inclusive artificial intelligence development.
content:

title: Samsung Shares Rise to Record After Report on Higher Chip Price
description: Samsung Electronics Co. shares jumped to a fresh record high Thursday, after local media reported that the firm is negotiating a price for its latest artificial intelligence memory chip that’s up to 30% higher than the previous generation.

title: 'Some of the greatest computer scientists in US are of Indian origin,' Stanford Professor says at AI Summit 2026
description: India is set to retain its top tech talent and foster its own artificial intelligence capabilities. Surya Ganguli, a Stanford expert, highlights the significant contributions of Indian-origin scientists in the US. He believes India's young population possesses immense talent. The nation is now positioned to grow sovereign AI. Sensible regulation is encouraged to support innovation without stifling it.

title: OpenAI Funding on Track to Top $100 Billion in Latest Round
description: OpenAI is close to finalizing the first phase of a new funding round that is likely to bring in more than $100 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, a record-breaking financing deal that would give the startup additional capital to build out its artificial intelligence tools.
